subject: Basketball (College)
Home Schooling
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
lead_paragraph: Moriah Jefferson, a junior who was home-schooled in Texas, and her teammates, many of whom were high school all-Americans, are trying to win UConn’s 10th title overall.
snippet: Moriah Jefferson, a junior who was home-schooled in Texas, and her teammates, many of whom were high school all-Americans, are trying to win UConn’s 10th title overall.
